title: How to Make Raspberry and Rose Lemonade

steps.headline: Process or blend the raspberries until they are smooth.
steps.description: Make it as smooth as you like personally.

steps.headline: Add the syrup and mix well.
Pour the raspberry and rose mix into a jug (pitcher).
steps.description: It can also be poured into a lemonade bottle with a cap.

steps.headline: Pour the lemonade in slowly and gently.
steps.description: If you pour it too fast, you'll cause the lemonade to froth up.

steps.headline: Place the raspberry and rose lemonade into the refrigerator to chill for at least a half hour prior to serving.
Add an ice cube or two to each glass before pouring the lemonade.

text: Process or blend the raspberries until they are smooth. Make it as smooth as you like personally. Add the syrup and mix well.  Pour the raspberry and rose mix into a jug (pitcher). It can also be poured into a lemonade bottle with a cap. Pour the lemonade in slowly and gently. If you pour it too fast, you'll cause the lemonade to froth up. Place the raspberry and rose lemonade into the refrigerator to chill for at least a half hour prior to serving.  Add an ice cube or two to each glass before pouring the lemonade.  Finished.
